supportDesc.support: Fragments 1-18 (in mm), (1) 29 x 42, (A) 1 line, bottom right margins, (B) blank, (2) 22 x 49, (A) 3 lines, right margin, (B) blank, (3) 29 x 24, (A) 6 lines, no margins, (B) 5 lines, no margins, (4) 42 x 40, (A) traces, (B) blank, (5) 46 x 43, (A) 2 lines, top bottom margins, (B) blank, (6) 46 x 30, (A) 6 lines, no margins, (B) traces of 4 lines, (7) 35 x 24, (A) traces of 2 lines, top left margins, (B) traces, (8) 24 x 26, (A) 3 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (9) 31 x 29, (A) 2 lines, no margins, (B) traces of 1 line, bottom margin, (10) 21 x 53, (A) 3 lines, left margin, (B) trace, (11) 40 x 27, (A) 2 lines, bottom margin, (B) vertical and horizontal lines in grid pattern, red ink, (12) 25 x 12, (A) 5 lines, no margins, blank and red ink, (B) blank, (13) 64 x 36, (A) 4 lines, right bottom margins, (B) blank, (14) 63 x 26, (A) 8 lines, bottom margin, (B) blank, (15) 69 x 33, (A) 6 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (16) 53 x 39, (A) 2 lines, no margins (?), (B) blank, (17) 86 x 30, (A) 2 lines (?), top bottom margins (?), (B) blank, (18) 64 x 41, (A) 1 line, (B) blank
